label: carrierParty
comment: A carrier party for this line trade agreement.
A carrier party for this logistics transport movement.
A carrier party for this piece of logistics transport equipment.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: The contractual terms of a header trade agreement.
